Subject: Biology
Question_English: Which animal is known as the 'King of the Jungle'?
Question_Yoruba: Ẹranko wo ni a mọ̀ sí 'Ọba Inú Igbó'?
Question_Hausa: Wace dabba ce aka sani da 'Sarkin Dajin'?
Question_Igbo: Kedu anụmanụ a maara dị ka 'Eze Ọhịa'?

Subject: Biology
Question_English: What do bees make that we like to eat?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni àwọn oyin ń ṣe tí a fẹ́ràn láti jẹ?
Question_Hausa: Me ƙudan zuma suke yi wanda muke son ci?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị ka aṅụ na-emepụta nke anyị na-amasị iri?

Subject: Biology
Question_English: How many legs does a spider have?
Question_Yoruba: Ẹsẹ̀ mélòó ni aláǹtakùn ní?
Question_Hausa: Ƙafafu nawa gizo-gizo yake da su?
Question_Igbo: Ụkwụ ole ka ududo nwere?

Subject: Biology
Question_English: Which organ in your body pumps blood?
Question_Yoruba: Ẹ̀yà ara wo ló ń pọ̀mù ẹ̀jẹ̀ nínú ara rẹ?
Question_Hausa: Wace gaba ce a jikinka take tura jini?
Question_Igbo: Kedu akụkụ ahụ gị na-agbapụta ọbara?

Subject: Biology
Question_English: What do we call a baby frog?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni a ń pe ọmọ ìgbín?
Question_Hausa: Me muke kiran jaririn kwaɗo?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị ka anyị na-akpọ nwa mbe?
Correct_Answer: Tadpole / Ọmọ ìgbín / Tunuku / Nwa nshịkọ

Subject: Biology
Question_English: Which part of the plant makes food using sunlight?
Question_Yoruba: Apá wo nínú igbó ló ń ṣe oúnjẹ nípa lílo oòrùn?
Question_Hausa: Wane sashen shuka ne yake yin abinci ta amfani da hasken rana?
Question_Igbo: Kedu akụkụ osisi na-emepụta nri site n'ìhè anyanwụ?

Subject: Biology
Question_English: Do fish breathe air like humans or use gills in water?
Question_Yoruba: Ǹjẹ́ ẹja ń mí afẹ́fẹ́ bí ènìyàn tàbí ó ń lo gílì nínú omi?
Question_Hausa: Shin kifi yana numfashi ne kamar mutum ko kuwa yana amfani da gills a cikin ruwa?
Question_Igbo: Azụ ọ na-eku ume ka ụmụ mmadụ ka ọ̀ na-eji 'gills' n'ime mmiri?

Subject: Biology
Question_English: What is the largest land animal?
Question_Yoruba: Ẹranko ilẹ̀ wo ló tóbi jù lọ?
Question_Hausa: Wace dabba ce tafi kowace girma a doron ƙasa?
Question_Igbo: Kedu anụmanụ kachasị ukwuu n'ala?

Subject: Biology
Question_English: What covers a bird's body to keep it warm?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni ó bo ara ẹyẹ láti jẹ́ kí ooru mọ́ ọn?
Question_Hausa: Me yake lulluɓe jikin tsuntsu don ya dumama shi?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị na-ekpuchi ahụ nnụnụ iji mee ka ahụ kporo ya ọkụ?
Correct_Answer: Feathers / Ìyẹ́ / Gashin tsuntsu / Abụba nnụnụ

Subject: Biology
Question_English: Which sense do we use to tell if something is sweet?
Question_Yoruba: Èrò wo ni a ń lò láti mọ̀ báyìí nǹkan bá dùn?
Question_Hausa: Wace gaba muke amfani da ita don sanin ko abu yana da zaƙi?
Question_Igbo: Kedu akụkụ ahụ anyị na-eji amata ma ihe ọ̀ tọrọ ụtọ?

Subject: Biology
Question_English: What do caterpillars turn into?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni àwọn kátapílà ń di?
Question_Hausa: Me tsutsa take komawa bayan ta girma?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị ka 'caterpillars' na-aghọ?
Correct_Answer: Butterfly / Labalábá / Malam buɗe mana littafi / Labalaba

Subject: Biology
Question_English: Which animal carries its baby in a pouch?
Question_Yoruba: Ẹranko wo ló ń gbé ọmọ rẹ̀ sínú àpò?
Question_Hausa: Wace dabba ce take ɗaukar jaririnta a cikin jaka?
Question_Igbo: Kedu anụmanụ na-ebu nwa ya n'akpa?

Subject: Biology
Question_English: What do humans use to smell things?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni àwọn ènìyàn ń lò láti fi gbóòórùn nǹkan?
Question_Hausa: Me mutane suke amfani da shi wajen jin ƙamshi ko wari?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị ka ụmụ mmadụ na-eji anu isi ihe?

Subject: Physics
Question_English: What is the force that pulls things down to Earth?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni agbára tí ó ń fa nǹkan lọ sí ilẹ̀ ayé?
Question_Hausa: Wane ƙarfi ne yake jan abubuwa ƙasa zuwa Duniya?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị bụ ike na-adọta ihe n'ala?

Subject: Physics
Question_English: Does wood sink or float in water?
Question_Yoruba: Ǹjẹ́ igi ń rì tàbí ó ń léfòó nínú omi?
Question_Hausa: Shin itace yana nitsewa ne ko kuwa yana shawagi a ruwa?
Question_Igbo: Osisi ọ na-emikpu n'ime mmiri ka ọ̀ na-ese n'elu mmiri?

Subject: Physics
Question_English: What color is a leaf during the dry season usually?
Question_Yoruba: Àwọ̀ wo ni ewé máa ń ní nígbà ọ̀dá sábà máa ń ní?
Question_Hausa: Wane launi ganye yake kasancewa dashi a lokacin rani?
Question_Igbo: Kedu ụcha akwụkwọ osisi na-enwekarị n'oge ọkọchị?
Correct_Answer: Brown or Yellow / Ilẹ̀ tàbí Ìyèyè / Ruwan ƙasa ko rawaya / Nchara

Subject: Physics
Question_English: Which tool do we use to measure temperature?
Question_Yoruba: Ohun èlò wo ni a ń lò láti wọn bí ooru bá ṣe pọ̀ tó?
Question_Hausa: Wace na'ura muke amfani da ita wajen auna zafin jiki?
Question_Igbo: Kedu ihe anyị na-eji atụle ọkụ ahụ?

Subject: Physics
Question_English: What happens to water when it freezes?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni ó ń ṣẹlẹ̀ sí omi nígbà tí ó bá dì?
Question_Hausa: Me yake faruwa da ruwa idan ya daskare?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị na-eme mmiri ma ọ kpụkọọ?
Correct_Answer: It turns to ice / Ó ń di yìnyín / Ya zama ƙanƙara / Ọ na-aghọ mmiri kpụkọrọ akpụkọ

Subject: Physics
Question_English: Can sound travel through water?
Question_Yoruba: Ǹjẹ́ ìró lè gba inú omi kọjá?
Question_Hausa: Shin sauti zai iya wucewa ta cikin ruwa?
Question_Igbo: Ụda ọ nwere ike isi n'ime mmiri gafee?

Subject: Physics
Question_English: Which material is attracted to a magnet?
Question_Yoruba: Ohun èlò wo ni magnetì ń fà?
Question_Hausa: Wane irin abu ne maganaɗisu yake jawa?
Question_Igbo: Kedu ihe magnet na-adọta?
Correct_Answer: Iron or Steel / Irin / Karfe / Ígwè

Subject: Physics
Question_English: How many colors are in a rainbow?
Question_Yoruba: Àwọ̀ mélòó ni ó wà nínú òṣùmàrè?
Question_Hausa: Launuka nawa ne suke cikin bakan gizo?
Question_Igbo: Ụcha ole dị n'egwurugwu?

Subject: Physics
Question_English: What do we call the path an object takes around the sun?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni a ń pe ọ̀nà tí nǹkan ń gbà yí oòrùn ká?
Question_Hausa: Me muke kiran hanyar da duniyoyi suke bi wajen zagaya rana?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị ka anyị na-akpọ ụzọ ihe na-eso agba gburugwu anyanwụ?

Subject: Physics
Question_English: Which energy comes from the sun?
Question_Yoruba: Agbára wo ni ó ń wá láti ọ̀dọ̀ oòrùn?
Question_Hausa: Wane ƙarfin haske ne yake fitowa daga rana?
Question_Igbo: Kedu ike na-esi n'anyanwụ abịa?
Correct_Answer: Solar Energy / Agbára oòrùn / Hasken rana / Ike anyanwụ

Subject: Physics
Question_English: Is a rock a solid, liquid, or gas?
Question_Yoruba: Ǹjẹ́ òkúta jẹ́ ohun líle, omi, tàbí afẹ́fẹ́?
Question_Hausa: Shin dutse daskararre ne, ko ruwa-ruwa, ko kuwa iska?
Question_Igbo: Nkume ọ̀ bụ ihe siri ike, mmiri, ka ọ̀ bụ ikuku?
Correct_Answer: Solid / Líle / Daskararre / Ihe siri ike

Subject: Physics
Question_English: What do you use to see things that are very tiny?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni o ń lò láti rí àwọn nǹkan tí ó kéré gan-an?
Question_Hausa: Me kake amfani da shi don ganin abubuwa ƙanana sosai?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị ka ị na-eji ahụ ihe ndị dị obere raba-raba?

Subject: Physics
Question_English: Does a shadow get longer or shorter at noon?
Question_Yoruba: Ǹjẹ́ òjìjí ń gùn sí i tàbí ó ń kéré sí i ní ọ̀sán gangan?
Question_Hausa: Shin inuwa tana tsayi ne ko tana gajarta da tsakar rana?
Question_Igbo: Onyinyo ọ na-adị ogologo ka ọ̀ na-adị mkpụmkpụ n'etiti ehihie?
Correct_Answer: Shorter / Kéré sí i / Gajarta / Mkpụmkpụ

Subject: Math
Question_English: How many corners does a square have?
Question_Yoruba: Igun mélòó ni àwòrán onígun mẹ́rin ní?
Question_Hausa: Kusurwoyi nawa ne murabba'i yake da su?
Question_Igbo: Akụkụ ole ka 'square' nwere?

Subject: Math
Question_English: What is 5 plus 5?
Question_Yoruba: Mélòó ni márun dípò márun?
Question_Hausa: Nawa ne biyar hada da biyar?
Question_Igbo: Ise na ise gbakọọ bụ ole?

Subject: Math
Question_English: Which shape is round like a ball?
Question_Yoruba: Àwòrán wo ni ó rí roboto bíi bọ́ọ̀lù?
Question_Hausa: Wace siffa ce take da zagaye kamar ƙwallo?
Question_Igbo: Kedu ọdịdị dị gburugwu ka bọọlụ?

Subject: Math
Question_English: If you have 3 pencils and buy 3 more, how many do you have?
Question_Yoruba: Tí o bá ní péńsílì 3 tí o sì tún ra 3 sí i, mélòó ni o ní?
Question_Hausa: Idan kana da fensir 3 ka sake siyan 3, nawa kake da su?
Question_Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na i nwere pensụl atọ, zụọkwa atọ ọzọ, ole ka i nwere?

Subject: Math
Question_English: What is the next number: 2, 4, 6, _?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni nọ́m̀bà tó kàn: 2, 4, 6, _?
Question_Hausa: Wace lamba ce za ta biyo baya: 2, 4, 6, _?
Question_Igbo: Kedu nọmba na-esote: 2, 4, 6, _?

Subject: Math
Question_English: Which is more: 15 or 12?
Question_Yoruba: Èwo ló pọ̀ jù: 15 tàbí 12?
Question_Hausa: Wanne ne ya fi yawa: 15 ko 12?
Question_Igbo: Kedu nke ka ukwuu: 15 ka ọ̀ bụ 12?
Correct_Answer: 15 / Mẹ́dogun / Goma sha biyar / Iri na ise

Subject: Math
Question_English: How many days are in a week?
Question_Yoruba: Ọjọ́ mélòó ni ó wà nínú ọ̀sẹ̀ kan?
Question_Hausa: Kwanki nawa ne a mako guda?
Question_Igbo: Ole bụ ụbọchị dị n'ime izu otu?

Subject: Math
Question_English: What shape has 3 sides?
Question_Yoruba: Àwòrán onígun mélòó ló ní ìhà 3?
Question_Hausa: Wace siffa ce take da ɓangarori uku?
Question_Igbo: Kedu ọdịdị nwere akụkụ atọ?
Correct_Answer: Triangle / Onígun mẹ́ta / Mai kusurwa uku / Triangle

Subject: Math
Question_English: Half of 4 is what?
Question_Yoruba: Ìdajì mẹ́rin jẹ́ kí ni?
Question_Hausa: Rabon huɗu nawa ne?
Question_Igbo: Ọkara nke anọ bụ ole?

Subject: Math
Question_English: What is 20 minus 5?
Question_Yoruba: Mélòó ni ogún yọ márun?
Question_Hausa: Nawa ne ashirin debar biyar?
Question_Igbo: Iri abụọ wepụ ise bụ ole?
Correct_Answer: 15 / Mẹ́dogun / Goma sha biyar / Iri na ise

Subject: Math
Question_English: How many months are in a year?
Question_Yoruba: Oṣù mélòó ni ó wà nínú ọdún kan?
Question_Hausa: Watanni nawa ne a shekara guda?
Question_Igbo: Ọnwa ole dị n'ime otu afọ?
Correct_Answer: 12 / Mejìlá / Goma sha biyu / Iri na abụọ

Subject: Math
Question_English: What is the symbol for addition?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni àmì fún ìròpọ̀?
Question_Hausa: Menene alamar ƙari?
Question_Igbo: Kedu ihe akara mgbakọ na nkwagharị?

Subject: Tech
Question_English: What do we use to see websites on the internet?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni a ń lò láti wo àwọn ojú-ewé lórí íńtánẹ́ẹ̀tì?
Question_Hausa: Me muke amfani da shi don duba shafukan yanar gizo?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị ka anyị na-eji ahụ saịtị n'ịntanetị?

Subject: Tech
Question_English: Which button on a keyboard is the longest?
Question_Yoruba: Bọ́tìnì wo lórí ìtẹ̀wé ló gùn jù lọ?
Question_Hausa: Wane maballin ne ya fi tsayi a jikin madannai?
Question_Igbo: Kedu bọtịnụ kachasị ogologo na 'keyboard'?

Subject: Tech
Question_English: Can a computer work without electricity or a battery?
Question_Yoruba: Ǹjẹ́ kọ̀m̀pútà lè ṣiṣẹ́ láìsí iná mànàmáná tàbí bátìrì?
Question_Hausa: Shin kwamfuta za ta iya aiki ba tare da wutar lantarki ko baturi ba?
Question_Igbo: Kọmputa ọ nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ n'enweghị ọkụ eletrik ma ọ bụ batrị?

Subject: Earth
Question_English: Which planet is known as the 'Red Planet'?
Question_Yoruba: Púlánẹ́ẹ̀tì wo ni a mọ̀ sí 'Púlánẹ́ẹ̀tì Pupa'?
Question_Hausa: Wace duniya ce aka sani da 'Jajayen Duniya'?
Question_Igbo: Kedu 'planet' a maara dị ka 'Red Planet'?

Subject: Earth
Question_English: What is the process of water falling from clouds called?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni a ń pe ìlànà tí omi ń já bọ́ láti inú àwọsánmọ̀?
Question_Hausa: Me muke kiran saukar ruwa daga gajimare?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị ka anyị na-akpọ mmiri na-esi n'igwe adaba?
Correct_Answer: Rain / Òjò / Ruwan sama / Mmiri ozuzo

Subject: Earth
Question_English: Which season follows the rainy season in Nigeria?
Question_Yoruba: Sáà wo ló ń tẹ̀ lé sáà òjò ní Nàìjíríà?
Question_Hausa: Wane lokaci ne yake biyo bayan lokacin damina a Najeriya?
Question_Igbo: Kedu oge na-esote oge mmiri ozuzo na Naịjirịa?
Correct_Answer: Dry Season / Sáà ọ̀dá / Lokacin rani / Ọkọchị

Subject: Earth
Question_English: What are large bodies of salt water called?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni a ń pe àwọn omi iyọ̀ títóbi?
Question_Hausa: Me muke kiran manyan tekuna masu gishiri?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị ka anyị na-akpọ nnukwu mmiri nnu?

Subject: Earth
Question_English: What gas do humans breathe in to live?
Question_Yoruba: Afẹ́fẹ́ wo ni àwọn ènìyàn ń mí sínú láti wà láàyè?
Question_Hausa: Wace iska ce mutane suke sha don su rayu?
Question_Igbo: Kedu ikuku ụmụ mmadụ na-eku ume iji dịrị ndụ?

Subject: Earth
Question_English: Which part of the Earth is mostly covered by water?
Question_Yoruba: Apá wo nínú ayé ni omi bo jù lọ?
Question_Hausa: Wane sashi na duniya ne mafi yawansa ruwa ne ya rufe shi?
Question_Igbo: Kedu akụkụ ụwa mmiri kachasị kpuchie?
Correct_Answer: Surface / Ojú ayé / Doron ƙasa / Elu ụwa

Subject: Earth
Question_English: What do we call a mountain that can explode with lava?
Question_Yoruba: Kí ni a ń pe òkè tí ó lè bú pẹ̀lú láfà?
Question_Hausa: Me muke kiran dutsen da yake aman wuta?
Question_Igbo: Gịnị ka anyị na-akpọ ugwu nwere ike ịgbapụta 'lava'?

Subject: Earth
Question_English: How long does it take for the Earth to go around the sun once?
Question_Yoruba: Báwo ni ó ṣe ń pẹ́ tó fún ayé láti yí oòrùn ká lẹ́ẹ̀kan?
Question_Hausa: Tsawon lokaci nawa ne duniya take zagaya rana sau daya?
Question_Igbo: Ole ka ọ na-ewe ụwa ịgba anyanwụ gburugwu otu ugboro?
Correct_Answer: One Year / Ọdún kan / Shekara guda / Otu afọ

Subject: Earth
Question_English: Which star is closest to the Earth?
Question_Yoruba: Ìràwọ̀ wo ló sún mọ́ ayé jù lọ?
Question_Hausa: Wane tauraro ne ya fi kusa da duniya?
Question_Igbo: Kedu kpakpando kachasị ụwa nso?
